entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Deerwood

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
